publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4299 Jamie Hepburn: Anniversaries of Cumbernauld Old Parish Church and Kildrum Parish Church—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Old Parish Church on celebrating its 350th anniversary this year; notes that this is a reminder of the long history of Cumbernauld, where there has been a worshipping community since the 13th century; further congratulates Kildrum Parish Church, Cumbernauld, on celebrating its 50th anniversary this year; further notes that this is a reminder of the rejuvenation of Cumbernauld as a new town in the 1950s, and wishes the congregations at both churches well for these significant milestones in the life of their churches.
S3M-4299 Anniversaries of Cumbernauld Old Parish Church and Kildrum Parish Church (lodged on 2 June 2009) Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-4299 Anniversaries of Cumbernauld Old Parish Church and Kildrum Parish Church (lodged on 2 June 2009) Margaret Mitchell*

S3M-4299 Jamie Hepburn: Anniversaries of Cumbernauld Old Parish Church and Kildrum Parish Church—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Old Parish Church on celebrating its 350th anniversary this year; notes that this is a reminder of the long history of Cumbernauld, where there has been a worshipping community since the 13th century; further congratulates Kildrum Parish Church, Cumbernauld, on celebrating its 50th anniversary in 2009; further notes that this is a reminder of the rejuvenation of Cumbernauld as a new town in the 1950s, and wishes the congregations at both churches well for these significant milestones in the life of their churches. Supported by: Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, Kenneth Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Margaret Mitchell
S3M-4299 Anniversaries of Cumbernauld Old Parish Church and Kildrum Parish Church (lodged on 2 June 2009) Gil Paterson*
